page.title: 05PREDICTIONS OF THE FUTURE
page.content: {1. Medical Health Care.}Thousands of new machines will be in use to help overcome illness and handicap. All medicine will be in capsules. Bottles will be collectors' items. Capsules to make you look ten years younger will be sold. Doctors will be able to cure old people of diseases by firing a lazer beam through their bodies, thus healing the disease. Babies could be injected at birth with brain cells from their parents. {2. Life styles in the future.}Homes will be filled with automatic or remote control appliances. Fireplaces and central heating systems will be replaced by solar panel heating in the roof. People will grow fat and lazy through lack of work and many will die prematurely from heart complaints. Clothes will have in-built heat system
